languages.text: {n}По лицу Хейнрикса пробегает тень — изумление, гнев и, наконец, тревога.{/n} "Скорее всего, враг хотел посеять сомнение в твоих союзниках. Будь я приверженцем Архиврага, вступил бы я в схватку за твою душу? Не верь ни слову, произнесенному врагами Империума, {name} — так ты рискуешь собственной душой".

{n}A shadow passes over Heinrix's face — astonishment, anger, and, finally, alarm.{/n} "Most likely, our enemy wanted to sow doubt among your allies. If I were a follower of the Archenemy, would I have fought for your soul? Don't trust a word the enemies of the Imperium say, {name}, lest you put your own soul at risk."
languages.original_text: {n}По лицу Хейнрикса пробегает тень — изумление, гнев и, наконец, тревога.{/n} "Скорее всего, враг хотел посеять сомнение в твоих союзниках. Будь я приверженцем Архиврага, вступил бы я в схватку за твою душу? Не верь ни слову, произнесенному врагами Империума, {name} — так ты рискуешь собственной душой".

If I were a follower of the Archenemy, would I have fought for your soul? Don't trust a word enemies of the Imperium say, {name}, lest you put your own soul at risk."

If I were a follower of the Archenemy, would I have fought for your soul? Don't trust a word enemies of the Imperium say, {name}, lest you put your own soul at risk."

If I were a follower of the Archenemy, would I have fought for your soul? Don't trust a word enemies of the Imperium say, {name}, lest you put your own soul at risk."

If I were a follower of the Archenemy, would I have fought for your soul? Don't trust a word enemies of the Imperium say, {name}, lest you put your own soul at risk."

{n}A shadow passes over Heinrix's face — astonishment, anger, and, finally, alarm.{/n} "Most likely, our enemy wanted to sow doubt among your allies. If I were a follower of the Archenemy, would I have fought for your soul? Don't trust a word the enemies of the Imperium say, {name}, lest you put your own soul at risk."

{n}A shadow passes over Heinrix's face — astonishment, anger, and, finally, alarm.{/n} "Most likely, our enemy wanted to sow doubt among your allies. If I were a follower of the Archenemy, would I have fought for your soul? Don't trust a word the enemies of the Imperium say, {name}, lest you put your own soul at risk."

languages.text: {n}Una sombra cruza la cara de Heinrix: asombro, ira y por fin alarma.{/n} «Lo más probable es que nuestro enemigo quisiera sembrar la cizaña entre nosotros. Si estuviera al servicio del Archienemigo, ¿habría luchado por su alma? No crea ni una palabra de los enemigos del Imperium, {name}, pues al hacerlo peligra su alma».
languages.original_text: {n}A shadow passes over Heinrix's face — astonishment, anger, and, finally, alarm.{/n} "Most likely, our enemy wanted to sow doubt among your allies. If I were a follower of the Archenemy, would I have fought for your soul? Don't trust a word the enemies of the Imperium say, {name}, lest you put your own soul at risk."

traits.locale_text: {n}Una sombra cruza la cara de Heinrix: asombro, ira y por fin inquietud.{/n} «Lo más probable es que nuestro enemigo quisiera sembrar la cizaña entre nosotros. Si estuviera al servicio del Archienemigo, ¿habría luchado por su alma? No crea ni una palabra de los enemigos del Imperium, {name}, pues al hacerlo peligra su alma».

languages.text: {n}ハインリックスの顔に影が落ちた…驚き、怒り、そして警戒といった具合に表情が変わった。{/n}「おそらく敵は、陛下の味方に疑念を植え付けようとしたんだろう。もし我が渾沌の勢力の信者だったら、陛下の魂のために戦ったと思いますか？帝国の敵がのたまう言葉に耳を貸してはいけません、{name}さん。魂が危険にさらされてしまう」
languages.original_text: {n}A shadow passes over Heinrix's face — astonishment, anger, and, finally, alarm.{/n} "Most likely, our enemy wanted to sow doubt among your allies. If I were a follower of the Archenemy, would I have fought for your soul? Don't trust a word the enemies of the Imperium say, {name}, lest you put your own soul at risk."

traits.locale_text: {n}ハインリックスの顔に影が落ちた…驚き、怒り、そして警戒といった具合に表情が変わった。{/n}「おそらく敵は、陛下の味方に疑念を植え付けようとしたんだろう。もし我が渾沌の勢力の信者だったら、陛下の魂のために戦ったと思いますか？帝国の敵がのたまう言葉に耳を貸してはいけません、{name}さん。魂が危険にさらされてしまう」

languages.text: {n}海因里希的脸上掠过一片阴影，先是惊讶、愤怒，最后是警觉。{/n}“最有可能的情况是，我们的敌人打算在你的盟友之间播下怀疑的种子。如果我真的是混沌大敌的追随者，那我还会为了保护你的灵魂而战吗？{name}，不要相信帝国之敌的谎言，否则你的灵魂会陷于危险之中。”
languages.original_text: {n}A shadow passes over Heinrix's face — astonishment, anger, and, finally, alarm.{/n} "Most likely, our enemy wanted to sow doubt among your allies. If I were a follower of the Archenemy, would I have fought for your soul? Don't trust a word the enemies of the Imperium say, {name}, lest you put your own soul at risk."

traits.locale_text: {n}海因里希的脸上掠过一片阴影，先是惊讶、愤怒，最后是不安。{/n}“最有可能的情况是，我们的敌人打算你的盟友之间播下怀疑的种子。如果我真的是混沌大敌的追随者，那我还会为了保护你的灵魂而战吗？{name}，不要相信帝国之敌的谎言，否则你的灵魂会陷于危险之中。”

languages.text: {n}Le visage d'Heinrix s'assombrit, il passe de l'étonnement à la colère, puis à l'inquiétude.{/n} « J'ai bien l'impression que notre ennemi tente de semer le doute parmi nos alliés. Me serais-je battu pour le salut de votre âme si j'étais un disciple du Grand Ennemi ? Ne vous fiez pas aux paroles de ceux qui ont trahi l'Imperium, {name}, vous y perdriez votre âme. »
languages.original_text: {n}A shadow passes over Heinrix's face — astonishment, anger, and, finally, alarm.{/n} "Most likely, our enemy wanted to sow doubt among your allies. If I were a follower of the Archenemy, would I have fought for your soul? Don't trust a word the enemies of the Imperium say, {name}, lest you put your own soul at risk."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le visage d'Heinrix s'assombrit, il passe de l'étonnement à la colère, puis à une profonde inquiétude.{/n} « J'ai bien l'impression que notre ennemi tente de semer le doute parmi nos alliés. Me serais-je battu pour le salut de votre âme si j'étais un disciple du Grand Ennemi ? Ne vous fiez pas aux paroles de ceux qui ont trahi l'Imperium, {name}, vous y perdriez votre âme. »

languages.text: {n}Ein Schatten huscht über Heinrix' Gesicht — Erstaunen, Wut und schließlich Unbehagen.{/n} "Vermutlich wollte unser Gegner unter Euren Verbündeten Zweifel säen. Wäre ich ein Anhänger des Erzfeinds, hätte ich dann um Eure Seele gekämpft? Ihr dürft den Gegnern des Imperiums kein Wort glauben, {name}, es würde nur Eure Seele gefährden."
languages.original_text: {n}A shadow passes over Heinrix's face — astonishment, anger, and, finally, alarm.{/n} "Most likely, our enemy wanted to sow doubt among your allies. If I were a follower of the Archenemy, would I have fought for your soul? Don't trust a word the enemies of the Imperium say, {name}, lest you put your own soul at risk."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ein Schatten huscht über Heinrix' Gesicht — Erstaunen, Wut und schließlich Unbehagen.{/n} "Vermutlich wollte unser Gegner unter Euren Verbündeten Zweifel säen. Wäre ich ein Anhänger des Erzfeinds, hätte ich dann um Eure Seele gekämpft? Ihr dürft den Gegnern des Imperiums kein Wort glauben, {name}, es würde nur Eure Seele gefährden."

languages.text: {n}Heinrix'in suratından bir karaltı geçiyor. Yüzünde şaşkınlık, öfke ve nihayet dehşet beliriyor.{/n} "Düşmanımızın amacı, muhtemelen müttefiklerimizin arasına nifak tohumu ekmekti. Şerbaşı'nın müridi olsaydım ruhun için savaşır mıydım? İmparatorluk'un düşmanlarına güven olmaz {name}. Kendi ruhunu tehlikeye atarsın."
languages.original_text: {n}A shadow passes over Heinrix's face — astonishment, anger, and, finally, alarm.{/n} "Most likely, our enemy wanted to sow doubt among your allies. If I were a follower of the Archenemy, would I have fought for your soul? Don't trust a word the enemies of the Imperium say, {name}, lest you put your own soul at risk."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix’in suratından bir karaltı geçiyor. Yüzünde şaşkınlık, öfke ve nihayet dehşet beliriyor.{/n} “Düşmanımızın amacı, muhtemelen müttefiklerimizin arasına nifak tohumu ekmekti. Şerbaşı’nın bir müridi olsaydım ruhun için savaşır mıydım? İmparatorluk’un düşmanlarına güven olmaz, {name}. Kendi ruhunu tehlikeye atarsın.”
